Message:
Ophelia’s hand invites me
to take it, and I...
I am the only one
who cannot refuse.

For I must forfeit
even my own life
if she wishes me to do so.

I softly pushed Executioner
back towards Ophelia,
and her face began to
twist in sorrow.

“Why...? Is this not
what you desire,
Queen Amleth...?”

It was. I wanted to protect
my loved ones without
spilling one drop of blood...

That was my wish—
a future that my own weakness
prevented me from choosing.

The world is a stage.
We are all jesters merely
performing a script
called “Fate”...

Still, should we fear decisions
and choose to do nothing,
we will truly become slaves to fate.

Without performers, the stage’s
curtain will not be raised.
Should a cruel fate end as a tragedy,

or change into a comedy?
That is nothing for any
god to decide.
It is for us humans to decide.
